recipe.title: Energy Shake
ingredients: 1/2 cup (packed) coarsely chopped kale leaves, center stalk and stem removed
Test kitchen tip: Freeze the banana for a colder, thicker beverage.
instructions: Combine orange juice, banana, chopped kale, kiwi, and chopped dates in blender. Puree until smooth, stopping and scraping down sides of blender as needed. Divide between two 12-ounce glasses and serve.
